description: Variation of condition 4 of planning consent MCK/TPNG/06617/3 granted on 29/04/1999, to vary the approved trading hours of Monday to Saturday 11:00am to 11:00pm and on Sundays and public holidays 12 noon to 10:30pm to Monday to Thursday 11:00am to 11:00pm, Fridays and Saturdays 11:00am to midnight (not Good Friday) and Sundays as existing 12 noon to 10:30pm
decision_conditions: Variation of condition number 4 to now read:  4>  "The hours of operation shall be restricted to 11am to 11pm Mondays to Thursdays and 11am to midnight Fridays and Saturdays (not Good Friday) and 12 noon to 10.30pm on Sundays and Public Holidays for a temporary period of one year.  This will expire on the 16th August 2001, after which, unless the Local Planlning Authority decides otherwise, the hours of operation shall be Monday to Saturday 11am to 11pm and Sundays and public holidays 12 noon to 10.30pm."  REASON:  In the interests of amenity of nearby properties and to monitor and assess the impact of the extension to the opening hours over the temporary period.
